p: This study utilized surveillance data over a long period of time (13â€‰years), giving a good glance of the JE situation over an extended duration in Yunnan Province. Inclusion of all cases reported in the province in the case-based surveillance system allowed for individual follow-up of all reported cases. The reporting of this study also followed the Strengthening the Reporting of Observational Studies in Epidemiology and the REporting of studies Conducted using Observational Routinely-collected health Data guidelines [ 22, 23].
